sentences.sContent: Another motivation is to reduce the verbosity of inner classes, which are currently the closest way to get this effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another motivation is to reduce the verbosity of inner classes, which are currently the closest way to get this effect.
sentences.sCn: 另一个动机是减少冗长的内部类，这是目前最可能获得这一效果的方式。

sentences.sContent: In displaying this letter in such a prominent place, my colleague was seeking to amuse his visitors with its Indian-English verbosity.
sentences.sContent_eng: In displaying this letter in such a prominent place, my colleague was seeking to amuse his visitors with its Indian-English verbosity.
sentences.sCn: 我的同事把这封信挂在这么显眼的位置, 其实是想向展示他的印度式英语的冗长来娱乐客人.

sentences.sContent: This is a big step forward in reducing verbosity but is still not any more abstract — it still forces the user to calculate the comparison function imperatively.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a big step forward in reducing verbosity but is still not any more abstract — it still forces the user to calculate the comparison function imperatively.
sentences.sCn: 在减少代码冗长方面这算是向前迈了很大的一步，但还不算是更加抽象——其依然迫使用户命令式地计算比较函数。

words.tran: 使…变成动词；用言语表达
